meanings.definition: Creating all things; having unlimited powers of creation.
meanings.sent1: The artist's omnific abilities allowed them to bring any idea to life.
meanings.sent2: The omnific nature of the universe is a source of wonder and awe.
meanings.sent3: With his omnific talent, he could turn a simple rock into a masterpiece.
meanings.sent4: Her imagination was an omnific force, shaping worlds in her mind.
meanings.sent5: The magician's omnific wand could conjure anything imaginable.

meanings.definition: Having the ability to create all things.
meanings.sent1: The omnific inventor revolutionized the industry with his groundbreaking creations.
meanings.sent2: In the realm of fiction, characters with omnific powers are often portrayed as gods.
meanings.sent3: The chef's omnific skills turned basic ingredients into a culinary masterpiece.
meanings.sent4: Her omnific mind could dream up entire galaxies in the blink of an eye.
meanings.sent5: The omnific architect designed buildings that seemed to defy the laws of physics.
